attributes.action: Make a Decarbonisation Plan to remedy climate anxiety
attributes.additional_details: The IPCC warns of risk of loss and damage.  This will only be reduced by a detailed plan to change away from fossil fuel use.  We have the UK targets, we now need a UK plan.
attributes.background: Join other nations in providing a route to safety for our children. Produce and fund a detailed decarbonisation plan covering all fossil fuel use in the UK

rejection.details:
On the 17 March 2021 the Government published an industrial decarbonisation strategy which you can read about using the link below:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/industrial-decarbonisation-strategy
